text: The Sopron District (; ) is a district in the western part of Győr-Moson- Sopron County. Sopron is also the name of the district seat in the Sopron District. The Sopron District is located in Western Transdanubia. == Municipalities == The district has 1 urban county, 2 towns, 1 large village and 35 villages. (ordered by population, as of 1 January 2012)A KSH 2012. évi helységnévkönyve The bolded municipalities are cities, italics municipality is large village. == Related pages == * List of cities and towns in Hungary == References == == Other websites == * Postal codes of the Sopron District Category:Districts in Győr-Moson-Sopron County
